external_games.name: Bestanden! Dein Weg zum Führerschein (German Highway Code)

name: Bestanden! Dein Weg zum Führerschein (German Highway Code)
summary: Discover the best way to learn the German Highway Code! Prepare for the exam, test your knowledge, and challenge your friends in exclusive mini games. Enjoy every mode in solo or with other players, overcome your blind spots with special quiz series. Your future driving license is right around the corner!
